website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, attractive, well-made bowl that holds a lot of sugar and complements almost any decor, cookware, or dinnerware.
pros: Distances itself from others with a contemporary stainless steel design that holds more than 16 ounces
Other handy features include a transparent lid, spoon slot, and spoon
cons: Rare reports of design irregularities, including ill-fittings lids and misshapen spoon slots

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Modern
customer_reviews.text: It's modern, sleek and great quality. The wide mouth on this sugar bowl makes it easier to fill AND to scoop. One of my pet peeves with most sugar bowls is the opening is so small that it's difficult to get one, true level teaspoon. I could get a 1/4 C out of this if I wanted. It's fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Ferrill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our home!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I do not use canisters as I do not use the basic things that go into them. I use sugar so this was perfect for my countertop!
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Simple but elegant
customer_reviews.text: It shouldn’t be difficult to find a practical sugar bowl that can be left out on the counter, but it took a long time to find this. I should have looked on Amazon at the start. This holds about 2 cups of sugar, is a nice size. It’s stainless steel so I don’t have to worry about it rusting and it comes with it’s own spoon which fits into the bowl. The clear top lets me see how much sugar is left. It looks good on the counter. It’s simple, practical and easy to care for. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: PT Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like photo!
customer_reviews.text: I guess this sugar bowl is alright, but it doesn't look like the picture! There is no brushed silver at all, it's all a shiny chrome-like surface. I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Reece

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same sugar bowl for twenty years...it was time to upgrade. This is the perfect sugar bowl. It has a clear look to it,the lid fits snuggly,and it comes with a nice little spoon. Nothing fussy. Nice and sleek. The amount of sugar it holds is about a cup and a half,great for use everyday
customer_reviews.author: RainNJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice next to my coffee maker. Everything is as described. I ordered two... one for sugar, one for creamer. It doesn’t have a lid that seals/suctions closed, just sits on top. No complaints, I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: emilyb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these bowls to hold sugar, powdered creamer, and artificial sweetener. They’re so pretty and shiny I don’t want to fill them! Arrived in perfect condition without a scratch. Only issue is the size of spoon’s bowl. Too small
customer_reviews.author: barbp

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought my mom this sugar dish for Christmas and after seeing it at her house purchased the same product for myself. I was using a Bodum canister for sugar but I had to leave my sugar spoon beside it. This nice stainless steel (dishwasher safe!) has its own spoon and a notch in the bowl so the lid fits flat. It's functional and attractive, perfect for the stainless kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: sugar sugar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sugar bowl specifically for the Sugar In The Raw I use for my tea. It's very cute and holds about half a box. It looks much better than the Tupperware I had sitting on the counter. And it also matches the little tea pot I use for loose leaf tea.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: The item has a good size and has a good look overall
customer_reviews.text: The item has a good size and has a good look overall. I was not pleased with the one I received because it's scratched at the bottom and it looks as if I received a used product.
customer_reviews.author: BereO

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: my wife is a big coffee drinker and she needed something to put her sugar in. this matches perfectly with the rest of our small household appliances and keurig. easy to clean, glad it comes with a little sugar spoon, and it looks very sleek on our countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love this bowl!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size for my homemade sugar hand scrub. It sits by the kitchen sink and I just lift the lid and put a teaspoon of sugar scrub in my hand with the silver spoon. Looks so cute on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Its a good bowl, but the lack of a seal on ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good bowl, but the lack of a seal on the lid allows moisture to get in when cooking and makes the sugar or salt clump...
customer_reviews.author: kidron cobb

customer_reviews.title: Kook sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered one to begin with. Wanted to see what it looked like. Loved it. Holds a lot. Liked it so much that I ordered another one to put Coffee mate into.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Dees

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Looks great. Works well. Fantastic! 👌
customer_reviews.text: Only labeling is the Kook logo on the bottom. Glass arrived with VERY light scratches and a light film; film rinsed off after handwashing. The scratches are not deep and completely unnoticeable until after put under extreme examination. I filled with exactly one pound of seasoning and could still close the lid, but I don't recommend doing that. 😆 Don't ask me to pull out that spoon later.... If you have reservations about buying it.... just do it. It is pretty and functional. And that is rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but the lid does not fit flush
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the lid does not quite fit flush against it's base. Since a sugar bowl is for that purpose of taking the lid on and off many of times it would make sense that part of the craftsmanship is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Megahz1

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Moisture not an issue.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this sugar bowl I thought it was exactly what I was looking for. When I received it in the mail and open the box, I knew that I was right. The bowl is made of high-quality metal and glass top. The only issue I was worried about was the moisture being able to get into the sugar. Almost no clumping was found in the sugar and it has been a very humid summer in Illinois.
customer_reviews.author: d0gg

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Bowls for both sweetener and creamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bowls for use as a sweetener and creamer bowl. They are excellent! The quantity is sufficient for both sweetener and creamer. The bowls are very nice looking. I had a couple of the bottle types where you had to shake/pound on the container to get the sweetener out. With these bowls and the accompanying spoons you don't have this problem. I'd recommend the bow(s) to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl looks beautiful but there is too much space between the spoon and the lid. Air easily gets in and my sugar hardens within a day. Not a huge problem but I wish the seal was better.
customer_reviews.author: JosieJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect size bowl. Its exactly what i need. I ordered to put butter in a bowl next to my gas so that i can put this on gas and melt it and use it. Then you can cover unused with a lit. Nice Quality of steel used.
customer_reviews.author: DC MEET

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel ion of the sugar bowl. Personally the spoon is too small for actual use. Overall I was very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wood

customer_reviews.title: An Elegant Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: What an elegant little bowl! The lid is clear, so the bowl's contents are visible; a spoon comes with the bowl and sits inside, ready for use; the bowl is stainless steel, somewhat squatty in design, and easy to clean. Use it for sugar, use it for candy or tiny pretzels, use it for dips or ice cream or pudding or rice. So many uses for a bowl that maybe you should have two!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: At first the Post Office Lost It - told me they didnt have it
customer_reviews.text: The post office initially lost it and told me they didnt have it. So I requested a replacement. Then a couple hours later the post office called me and said they found it so I picked it up. It's lovely, lightweight and it looks exactly like the pictures. The seller did a great job sending it. It turns out it was the post office that messed up.
customer_reviews.author: G. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely, well made sugar bowl, even the spoon that comes with it is nice. Arrived in good time, seller sent email to see if bowl was to my liking. This will sit full time on kitchen table for easy access to my three espresso a day, husband. He is set in his ways but he accepted the new sugar bowl without complaint.....then later said....this is great! Glad I found this KooK Sugar Bowl.
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina shopping chickTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: There is a part of the metal inside the bowl that started to turn black. Upon closer inspection, it has a nick and therefore it started to corrode. The same happened to the spook that was supplied with the bowl. Terrible quality and could be considered dangerous since this black item came in contact with my chili item.
customer_reviews.author: RJBB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: I already had a steel sugar bowl and wanted something for powdered creamer. The fact that the lid is glads means nobody mistakes the creamer bowl for the sugar bowl and it is large enough that if you use a lot of powdered creamer you're not constantly refilling it. Also it is squat so it doesnt tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I cleaned it well when I first received it and use it everyday to hold my erythritol. It holds a good amount and I don't feel like I am refilling constantly like I have with other more traditional sugar bowls. I would definitely recommend it and would buy it for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for sugar.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work for sugar very well. It doesn't seal and allows moisture in and the sugar gets hard and lumpy. Probably ok for other types of items.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking / Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: This sugar bowl looks nice at first, but the top looks horrible. Where the glass meets the metal it is distorted. I don't know if it's bad gluing, or adhesive, but if you are attentive to detail and want a nice sugar bowl, this is not it. For the price I will keep it, but will not buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to coffee station
customer_reviews.text: Holds 1.5 cups of sugar comfortably, 2 cups may be a bit too full for the spoon indent. Lid doesn't seal on, but wont just fall/slide off if you hit it on accident. Overall better than the large main sugar container I was using and better than the pouring sugar dispensers I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Heavymetal4life

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Shiny Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this sugar bowl. The stainless steel is bright and as a neutral goes with everything I keep on the counter--kept the old one in the cupboard, but I want to look at this one. Beats the price to buy a sugar bowl to match my dishes by about $20, and if I drop it, it may survive.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I love the glass top
customer_reviews.text: I love the glass top, but do not like for the metal spoon to sit inside the container (even though the lid is covering it). There is a small hole for the spoon on the side of the dish. The air cakes up the sugar in the dish a little. Other than that, it is very decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Flow Child

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sugar bowl because my husband broke our china bowl. This one is not only unbreakable, it looks great. We like it enough that I would definitely buy one as a gift. It has a pleasing design with clean lines and a highly polished finish. Nice item for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because based on the picture, I expected it to be brushed stainless with a shiny band of non-brushed. I would prefer brushed. It has zero brushed stainless on it. It is all shiny. It’s pretty but it’s not the look I wanted. I’m keeping it because I like the size and way it’s made with the spoon, but I put it in the cabinet instead of displaying it as planned, because it doesn’t match my brushed appliances and it smudged and showed fingerprints easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Furtner

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good sized container! I have been using it on my countertop to store some ghee and it is the perfect size for it. It does need to be cleaned from the outside very frequently but I am not facing any troubles while cleaning. The shine and look of the container is still as good as new even after a couple of months use.
customer_reviews.author: IceLady

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for sugar bowl. Spoon is small and proportioned pretty well. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a cool sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Small but adorable. I bought this because I was tired of having a giant ugly container of sugar on my counter. This is sleek, nice looking but holds only about a cup and a half of sugar. Also if you live in a moist environment this will not protect the sugar from moisture. It is very cute, and fits our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Cosmos

customer_reviews.title: Charming bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's an adorable bowl. It's a good size. It is NOT two-toned as pictured...it appears 2 toned due to the reflections. The little slot where the spoon rests has sharp edges; the metal piece that is punched out was actually inside the bowl. All in all, it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: LynnRaeB

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a second one, I love this sugar bowl just that much. It hold two cups, the notch for the spoon allows the lid to lie flat, and the spoon is small enough to make me feel like I’m using less sugar in my coffee than usual, since I won’t allow myself to add more spoonfuls.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this sugar bowl! It is durable and has a classy look about it. I love the way they designed it with a cut out place for the spoon, which is included, I might add. You will love this product, trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These look very classy and seem to be very sturdy. A little lightweight but definitely worth the money I paid for them. I have only been using them a few days but so far they make a very nice addition to my coffee area in my kitchen. They also completely match my color scheme. I am very happy with this purchase so far. If I experience moisture build up or any flaking I will update my review. I do not believe this will be an issue they appear to be a high quality
customer_reviews.author: Terrie L Jager

customer_reviews.title: Does it all . . .
customer_reviews.text: This sugar bowl is finished beautifully, the cover fits perfectly and the spoon is comfortable to use. We are replacing a smaller one - tired of refilling so often. This bowl capacity is deceptively large; the footprint is unobtrusive and the design would fit in anywhere, from modern to classic. Great price, speedy delivery; excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JPT

customer_reviews.title: Large Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about purchasing, thinking it might be too big. But I love this sugar bowl. I really like being able to see how much sugar is left and I love that the bowl has an indentation to hold the spoon. I have seen some people complain that the spoon isn't big enough but I think it's perfect size. I also get so many compliments on it, with people wanting it for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Very practical use
customer_reviews.text: They really are for sugar, but I found them very useful to keep my spicy sauces in the refrigerator, I also think they look very nice and last longer, because as they are made of metal, the sauces are better kept. good product highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Maria c.

customer_reviews.title: KooK Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I received the KooK sugar bowl earlier than expected and have been very pleased with it. I like the way it looks and is easy to use. I like the notch in the bowl which allows the spoon to rest in the bowl when the top is on.
customer_reviews.author: L. Squires

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great product
customer_reviews.text: This covered sugar dish definitely fits the bill. Holds about 1 and half cups of sugar and includes a spoon and notched side so it's always ready for service. Love the stainless steel which goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar bowl! Mostly because it holds 2 cups of sugar so I don't have to fill it every 5 mins. Its sturdy which means no more broken ceramic bowl...good for seniors. It's beautiful. I like how it holds the spoon it came with but i used my own special one that was the same size. Great gift, good for seniors and beautiful. What more can u ask for?
customer_reviews.author: shadowd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because it was marked and scratched up, kinda like it had been used and returned. I’m still using it, only because I needed one and didn’t want to bother with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Conway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 2 months and love it. Gives a perfect teaspoon with each spoonful (spoon included)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kam

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Appearance
customer_reviews.text: It is large enough that we dont need to fill with sugar as much as the old sugar bowl. We live in a humid climate and have not had any problems with clumping of sugar. It looks very nice in the coffee area in our kitchen. It looks chic and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little sugar bowl.  It would make a great gift.  AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: As a sugar bowl it's quite nice. I wish it had a slot or something on the side for the spoon - I hate putting a partially wet spoon back in the bowl. It would make a great wedding present.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN BRANDLI

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get rid of all the old things in my new kitchen. That meant getting rid ofmy old sugar Bowl that I had for at least 15 years. This cute small stainless steel bowl with glass lid and spoon was perfect. It goes well with the stainless steel already in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described and much prettier. I use a dry creamer for my coffee so it works perfectly for my sugar in one and my creamer in the other one. The perfect set for my coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: mary glanton

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at holding sugar and it does look nice on my counter. The spoon is larger than the last one so I haven't been cleaning up as many spills lately. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: was exactly what it looked like. There was no misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: I thought the picture of this product, was exactly what it looked like. There was no misrepresentation. Although, it was even more pretty, when received. I was extremely pleased with my purchase. Thank you, Kimberley P.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my morning routine. I love this sugar bowl. The fit and finish are great. The spoon is nice addition. I absolutely love the stainless steel. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but...
customer_reviews.text: The lid is not sealed and there is a 3mm gap or so where the spoon sits in the bowl. Suspect this will cause issues with humidity and insects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: this sugar bowl is simply adorable! its small and replaces my old one just as i imagined! it looks much more expensive than it really is. the spoon has a perfect spot inside and sugar does not fly all over.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking sugar bowl. I really like it. I have sugar in the raw in this one. I’m going to order another one for regular sugar.
customer_reviews.author: IQUILT2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it great looking it holds enough sugar so that you are not having to constantly refill. The glass top is my only worry due to breakage but overall I love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Cuccio

customer_reviews.title: A sugar bowl for all
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is transparent glass so only a glance tells you if it's empty. It stores the spoon so it's always available and no damp coffee spoon goes in to cause lumping. Delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I broke my china sugar bowl and looked for a replacement. This is way nicer than I expected. It’s stainless with a glass lid so you can see the sugar level, and has a notch in the top of the bowl right under the lid that accommodates a little spoon.
customer_reviews.author: harley dood

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: Nice large sugar dish. Stainless steelenwith a clear top, really cute. great price Jus what i was lookig for, I ha to continually fill up the old sugar dish. This one is nice and light but seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, looks like it will last longer than the previous sugar container I had which developed a crack.
customer_reviews.author: VIC

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bowl to hold my sugar for my coffee and tea whenever I make them. I no longer have to scoop sugar from the sugar bag, I have my own sugar on the side. It's small and cute and holds enough. The spoon comes in handy too, this way I won't have to use two spoons when adding sugar, one for the bag, one to stir my drink and taste. It makes your countertop look beautiful as well. If you have the same issues I have, this is something you'll want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonique Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Too cute! Yet functional.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bowl because it looked good on my kitchen counter. It held just the right amount of sugar and the little spoon was just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Gail

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight
customer_reviews.text: This little dish has a nice weight so it wont tip over easily. Also enough room to add a larger spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Ft Worth, TX

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sugar bowl! Plus comes with a little handy spoon alright! Easy to clean,holds alot of sugar,and no seen rust after a couple of months use!
customer_reviews.author: cate

customer_reviews.title: Nice sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I put my Stevia sugar in it for my tea in the morning. It's easy to store and pull out. It comes with a teaspoon with a notch in the bowl so the lid fits right over it. Looks very modern and would look good in any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: DAV

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality and the appearance of the sugar bowl. My glass bowl broke so I like the fact that this one is stainless and that the glass top is surrounded by a stainless rim. Looks good and works great
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of this sugar bowl, though I am gonna use it for keeping ghee in it for quick access. I don't think i could find this level of quality at this price. I saw a similar product at around 15 dollars but then I ordered this one for $10 so worked out even better. I recommend it to others and I might buy it again for sugar this time.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: the spoon
customer_reviews.text: Great sugar bowl, nice easy to clean and use, the spoon seems to collect sugar on it and it hardens. Stir your drink and wipe spoon, its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sugar bowl. It is very well made and looks great. I would recommend this bowl for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp edges at spoon opening
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp edges at spoon opening. Be very careful while cleaning. I already had 2 cuts. But the quality seems very good. I could give 5 stars for quality and looks. But 0 or negative stars for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Raghuram

customer_reviews.title: Always open cut out for spoon.
customer_reviews.text: It is a easy to use sugar bowl with a cut out for the spoon to rest in. The downside of that is it’s not sealed and bugs can get in it. Better used in the winter for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I like that is metal and that it comes with its own spoon. The glass look thick so I am not worried that it could brake.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Sibri

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is best!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice sugar, spices, loose tea bowls. The only issue I had was that I nearly cut my hand cleaning them on the sharp spoon opening. Very sharp. The lid button handle could have also been aligned a bit better, but not a big deal. Overall, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ehuanochtli

customer_reviews.title: Good size but wrong finish
customer_reviews.text: Just received item Sheen is not as pictured. It's not polished steel more traditional matte stainless steel. Good size for small counter space. Still undecided if I should return due to material finish
customer_reviews.author: D.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this sugar bowl by Kook. Very nice, I adore stainless steel, easy to clean, and looks very nice on your table or other places, holds 2 cups of sugar and the spoon and glass was a plus for me. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: April Renn/AprilR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I know this sugar bowl will serve our home for years to come. Very sturdy has a nice weight to it. Some reviews said the spoon was too small, I find it to be the perfect size. Holds a good amount of sugar. I like the glass lid , nice delicate touch. Planning to buy for gifting again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I was needing a sugar bowl or all around small bowl like this. I can anticipate many types of sauces, etc that this will be great for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for Christmas. It is well made, sleek and sturdy. Plus it comes with its own spoon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Stolarz

customer_reviews.title: Attractive sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sugar bowl, just the right size and it's getting a lot of use. Actually I keep Splenda in it to sweeten my drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: To anyone that needs to purchase A Superb sugar bowl stainless steel I found it to be wonderfully designed not To masculine nor to Feminnite
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Wicked cute, kinda small
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, one for sugar and one for instant coffee. i searched amazon forEVER hoping to find extra large ones but settled for these. they each hold about 2 cups. cute enough though that they look really good on my coffee/tea bar.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. The sapoon is just right. I use for brown sugar that I put into my coffee every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Cool vibes, and it holds sugar
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot to say about this, other than 1. it looks nice 2. it successfully holds sugar inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Hertzler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy and won't tip over. Shiny stainless steel with wide glass cover. Large enough without having to refill the sugar bowl frequently. The stainless steel spoon is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It much bigger than I expected, unfortunately this the downside of buying online. Otherwise it is a very nice bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sugar bowl! It is easy to fill and since the spoon fits nicely in the slot, the sugar remains dry and does not lump. I'm considering buying another for brown sugar, classy looking container!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice... Perfect size.. elegant look. I’m very pleased with it, just what I needed for my coffee little coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Cute-T

customer_reviews.title: Cute sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sugar bowl. Big enough to not need refilling constantly, and small enough to not take up a bunch of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: An Everyday Object that is a Joy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high-end contemporary look to the bowl. It is well-made and is a pleasure to use. The included spoon fits well into the bowl and lid. No scratches -- came in perfect condition. Mid-century upscale decorating aesthetic to this sugar bowl. Why shouldn't everyday objects be a joy to use? THEY SHOULD! This is.
customer_reviews.author: Nevertheless

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a large sugar bowl and was so happy to find this one. Perfect size and pretty too! Sleek and stylish, this is a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sugar bowls! I ordered 2, one for my sugar and one for my creamer. I live how the spoon can sit in it and the lid can close. Would order these again. Everyone who saw them at my house wants to order them!
customer_reviews.author: Stasia

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the size of this sugar bowl as it is a bit larger than you usually find. It's design is sleek and it works well in my kitchen without being obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It's an unbreakable sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. It holds about 2 cups of sugar, there is a cutout for the tiny spoon so the lid can fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Not too small not too big
customer_reviews.text: Love this sugar dish! It’s perfect, holds the amount of brown sugar I need! Easy to clean and nice on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Eangelk

customer_reviews.title: Function and form
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of sugar but because it has an opening for the spoon and i live in a humid climate the sugar will tend to clump despite the spoon only being used to pour sugar into things and not mixing it in liquids. Very pretty, convenient and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful sugar bowl. Just perfect. Very nice to look at and very handy on the table.
customer_reviews.author: LILIA RASULOV

product_meta.title: KooK Large Sugar Bowl, Stainless Steel With Glass Lid, Includes Stainless Steel Spoon, Holds 2 cups of Sugar, 16.9oz
feature_bullets: This sugar dispenser bowl is the perfect addition to any table.
Never look for a spoon again as this item comes with a stainless steel spoon and has a slot so it will never get lost.
A wide mouth opening makes it easy to serve and dispense
Made of Stainless Steel, making it incredibly durable.
